foreignData.name: Nesseldrohne
foreignData.text: Fahl (Diese Karte hat keine Farbe.){T}: Die Nesseldrohne fügt jedem Gegner 1 Schadenspunkt zu.Immer wenn du einen farblosen Zauberspruch wirkst, enttappe die Nesseldrohne.

foreignData.name: Zángano urticante
foreignData.text: Vacío. (Esta carta no tiene ningún color.){T}: El Zángano urticante hace 1 punto de daño a cada oponente.Siempre que lances un hechizo incoloro, endereza el Zángano urticante.

foreignData.name: Drone lamier
foreignData.text: Carence (Cette carte n'a pas de couleur.){T} : Le Drone lamier inflige 1 blessure à chaque adversaire.À chaque fois que vous lancez un sort incolore, dégagez le Drone lamier.

foreignData.name: Parassita dagli Aculei
foreignData.text: Vacuità (Questa carta non ha colore.){T}: Il Parassita dagli Aculei infligge 1 danno a ogni avversario.Ogniqualvolta lanci una magia incolore, STAPpa il Parassita dagli Aculei.

foreignData.name: 棘撃ちドローン
foreignData.text: 欠色（このカードは無色である。）{T}：棘撃ちドローンは各対戦相手にそれぞれ１点のダメージを与える。あなたが無色の呪文を１つ唱えるたび、棘撃ちドローンをアンタップする。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — エルドラージ・ドローン

foreignData.name: 쐐기 드론
foreignData.text: 결여 (이 카드는 무색이다.){T}: 쐐기 드론은 각 상대에게 피해 1점을 입힌다.당신이 무색 주문을 발동할 때마다, 쐐기 드론을 언탭한다.

foreignData.name: Zangão Espinhoso
foreignData.text: Desprovido (Este card não tem cor.){T}: Zangão espinhoso causa 1 ponto de dano a cada oponente.Toda vez que você conjurar uma mágica incolor, desvire Zangão Espinhoso.

foreignData.name: Колкий Дрон
foreignData.text: Лишение (У этой карты нет цвета.){T}: Колкий Дрон наносит 1 повреждение каждому оппоненту.Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете бесцветное заклинание, разверните Колкого Дрона.

foreignData.name: 荨麻奴兽
foreignData.text: 虚色（此牌没有颜色。）{T}：荨麻奴兽向每位对手各造成1点伤害。每当你施放无色咒语时，重置荨麻奴兽。

foreignData.name: 蕁麻奴獸
foreignData.text: 虛色（此牌沒有顏色。）{T}：蕁麻奴獸向每位對手各造成1點傷害。每當你施放無色咒語時，重置蕁麻奴獸。

name: Nettle Drone
originalText:
Devoid (This card has no color.){T}: Nettle Drone deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Whenever you cast a colorless spell, untap Nettle Drone.

rulings.text: Cards with devoid use frames that are variations of the transparent frame traditionally used for Eldrazi. The top part of the card features some color over a background based on the texture of the hedrons that once imprisoned the Eldrazi. This coloration is intended to aid deckbuilding and game play.
A card with devoid is just colorless. It’s not colorless and the colors of mana in its mana cost.
Other cards and abilities can give a card with devoid color. If that happens, it’s just the new color, not that color and colorless.
Devoid works in all zones, not just on the battlefield.
If a card loses devoid, it will still be colorless. This is because effects that change an object’s color (like the one created by devoid) are considered before the object loses devoid.

text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
{T}: Nettle Drone deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Whenever you cast a colorless spell, untap Nettle Drone.
